explains: n. 年长，职位高；资历，年资

sentences.en: Should promotion be based on merit or seniority?
sentences.cn: 提拔一个人应当看业绩，还是看资历？

sentences.en: They offered him a post befitting his seniority and experience.
sentences.cn: 他们给他提供了一个适合他的资历与经验的职位。

sentences.en: Ought promotion to go by seniority or by abilities?
sentences.cn: 晋级应以年资为准，还是以能力为准？
